### Database and Journal Websites

<details class="subsection-dropdown" open>
<summary class="subsection-title">Databases</summary>
<div class="subsection-content">

- [Web of Science](https://www.webofscience.com/wos/alldb/basic-search){target="_blank"}
- [EBSCO](http://search.ebscohost.com/){target="_blank"}: Access to INFORMS, MIS Quarterly, AMJ, AMR article.
- [Sage](https://journals.sagepub.com/){target="_blank"}: Access to Some TopMarketing Journals.
- [SSRN](https://www.ssrn.com/){target="_blank"}
- [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/){target="_blank"}
- [JSTOR](https://www.jstor.org/){target="_blank"}
- [Sci-hub](https://tool.yovisun.com/scihub/){target="_blank"}
- [Ablesci](https://www.ablesci.com/){target="_blank"}: 科研通

</div>
</details>
